name: Cider (The Field is Made of Articulate Joints)
name_original: Cider (The Field is Made of Articulate Joints)
description:
A small point-and-click game made to figure out Unity. Based on a small comic I drew in August last year. While it doesn't include everything I'd hoped to include in it, and there are a few spots where player navigation hitches up, it feels finished enough and I'm charmed by what it is.

It may be a horror game.
You kill a deer that is already dying.
There is a whale.
